name: The Adventures of Cupcake Girl
description:
This is just a very basic text game in which I will be turning into a 2d Platformer and serves as an intro to what will be and with much more details in the future. I have never tried anything like this before and as a Dad who has always wanted to create something fun, I finally get to do just that, following my dreams.  Hope you all enjoy and please leave some feedback with the given link below as well as any problems you may encounter! Cheers!

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScDDKkmZwiiSDldOK6g9NW_H2fFxC2xan1XNE2B...
